channel.title: 718 Crimson Scape
channel.description:
[CENTER] [SIZE=4][B]Crimsonscape Forums: [URL=http://"http://www.crimsonscape.x10.mx/forum/"]Forums[/URL] Downloadable Client: [URL=http://"http://http://www.crimsonscape.x10.mx/forum/index.php?board=4.0"]Downloadable client[/URL] Play Webclient: Coming Soon! Price Guide: Coming soon![/B][/SIZE]
Why you should play Crimsonscape?
Choose your experience mode and starter pack Realistic PKing System Unique features that only Crimsonscape has Many different Bosses to fight (Thunderous, Blink, Party demon and more!) Many different minigames (the Crucible, Dominion tower, Zombie onslaught and more!) Double Experience weekends Stable high economy & market small friendly community and staff Supportive staff members Many new items (Drygores, Glaiven, Dominion weapons ) Fully working item effects Prestige and skiller shop Loyalty point shop Forinthry dungeon Construction skill Dungeoneering skill Unique dungeoneering training Bank tabs PVM contracts Unique crystal key chest rewards and interface
[spoiler=Media][URL=http://s940.photobucket.com/user/partyhatz4me/media/Banktabs_zpscfcc2eed.png.html][IMG]http://i940.photobucket.com/albums/ad247/partyhatz4me/Banktabs_zpscfcc2eed.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s940.photobucket.com/user/partyhatz4me/media/Prestigeshop_zpsf3953bd3.png.html][IMG]http://i940.photobucket.com/albums/ad247/partyhatz4me/Prestigeshop_zpsf3953bd3.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s940.photobucket.com/user/partyhatz4me/media/loyal_zps8bb632f5.png.html][IMG]http://i940.photobucket.com/albums/ad247/partyhatz4me/loyal_zps8bb632f5.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s940.photobucket.com/user/partyhatz4me/media/crystal_zps0d191993.png.html][IMG]http://i940.photobucket.com/albums/ad247/partyhatz4me/crystal_zps0d191993.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s940.photobucket.com/user/partyhatz4me/media/bosses_zps736fb5ad.png.html][IMG]http://i940.photobucket.com/albums/ad247/partyhatz4me/bosses_zps736fb5ad.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s940.photobucket.com/user/partyhatz4me/media/glacors_zps468c9f45.png.html][IMG]http://i940.photobucket.com/albums/ad247/partyhatz4me/glacors_zps468c9f45.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s940.photobucket.com/user/partyhatz4me/media/nomad_zps1e9a43c9.png.html][IMG]http://i940.photobucket.com/albums/ad247/partyhatz4me/nomad_zps1e9a43c9.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s940.photobucket.com/user/partyhatz4me/media/construction_zps8c470046.png.html][IMG]http://i940.photobucket.com/albums/ad247/partyhatz4me/construction_zps8c470046.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s940.photobucket.com/user/partyhatz4me/media/Pvmcontract_zps51d302fc.png.html][IMG]http://i940.photobucket.com/albums/ad247/partyhatz4me/Pvmcontract_zps51d302fc.png[/img][/URL][/spoiler]
And theres alot more in store for you Check us out![/CENTER]
